price: 你们中当有一部分人，导人于至善，并劝善戒恶；这等人，确是成功的。
arabic: وَلۡتَكُن مِّنكُمۡ أُمَّةٞ يَدۡعُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَيَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waltakun minkum ummatun yadʿūna ilā al-khayri wayamurūna bil-maʿrūfi wayanhawna ʿani al-munkari wa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
